Title: Augmenting a Dragon
Description:
Adamanthia!

She has been imprisoned for ages, trapped in torment. While the dracthyr slept, she suffered.

I can only hope she has not given in to Deathwing's madness during her long imprisonment. The passage of time may have shattered her mind.

Be ready, champion. Should she lash out, aid Ebyssian. Augment his abilities, so he can subdue Adamanthia instead of slaying her.

She has earned a chance. We must give it to her.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Ebyssian to initiate the ritual
